soba_userInput: Add concepts to model additional dimensions of Health, in detail
soba_metaModelContext:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ecore:EPackage xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ecore="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore" name="mindMap" nsURI="http://mindmap/0.1" nsPrefix="map">
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Map">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="description">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="root" eType="//Concept" containment="true"/>
  </eClassifiers>
  <eClassifiers xsi:type="ecore:EClass" name="Concept">
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="name">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="subConcepts" upperBound="-1" eType="//Concept" containment="true" eOpposite="//Concept/parent"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="parent" eType="//Concept" eOpposite="//Concept/subConcepts"/>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EAttribute" name="description">
      <eType xsi:type="ecore:EDataType" href="http://www.eclipse.org/emf/2002/Ecore#//EString"/>
    </eStructuralFeatures>
    <eStructuralFeatures xsi:type="ecore:EReference" name="relatedTo" upperBound="-1" eType="//Concept"/>
  </eClassifiers>
</ecore:EPackage>

subConcepts.name: Cognition & Attention
subConcepts.description: Memory, concentration, decision-making and executive function

subConcepts.name: Common Disorders
subConcepts.description: Depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder — recognition and treatment pathways

subConcepts.name: Mental Health Care
subConcepts.description: Therapy, medication, self-help strategies and access to services

subConcepts.name: Mental Health
subConcepts.description: Cognitive function, mental disorders, treatment and prevention

subConcepts.name: Emotional Regulation
subConcepts.description: Skills to identify, express and manage emotions

subConcepts.name: Resilience & Coping
subConcepts.description: Building coping strategies, stress reduction techniques and recovery after setbacks

subConcepts.name: Support & Therapy
subConcepts.description: Counseling, group therapy, peer support and crisis resources

subConcepts.name: Emotional Health
subConcepts.description: Understanding and managing emotions for wellbeing

subConcepts.name: Relationships
subConcepts.description: Family, friendships and intimate relationships — communication and boundaries

subConcepts.name: Community & Belonging
subConcepts.description: Social networks, civic engagement and support systems

subConcepts.name: Social Skills & Conflict Resolution
subConcepts.description: Communication, empathy, negotiation and managing social stressors

subConcepts.name: Social Health
subConcepts.description: Interactions, support networks and social wellbeing

subConcepts.name: Physical Environment
subConcepts.description: Air and water quality, housing, urban design and green spaces

subConcepts.name: Workplace & Safety
subConcepts.description: Occupational exposures, ergonomics and hazard prevention

subConcepts.name: Environmental Health
subConcepts.description: External factors that affect health and wellbeing

subConcepts.name: Purpose & Meaning
subConcepts.description: Personal values, life meaning and connectedness

subConcepts.name: Practices
subConcepts.description: Meditation, reflection, rituals and community practices that support wellbeing

subConcepts.name: Spiritual Health
subConcepts.description: Aspects of meaning, values and spiritual practices

recommendationPayload.name: Health
recommendationPayload.description: A mind map with ideas for healthy living
